  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeleteFormsTask
    Task responsible for deleting selected forms.
    DeleteInstancesTask
    Task responsible for deleting selected instances.
    DiskSyncTask
    Background task for adding to the forms content provider, any forms that have been added to the sdcard manually.
    DownloadFormListTask
    Background task for downloading forms from urls or a formlist from a url.
    DownloadFormsTask
    Background task for downloading a given list of forms.
    FormLoaderTask
    Background task for loading a form.
    FormLoaderTask.FECWrapper  
    InstanceServerUploaderTask
    Background task for uploading completed forms.
    InstanceSyncTask
    Background task for syncing form instances from the instances folder to the instances table.
    InstanceUploaderTask  
    InstanceUploaderTask.Outcome
    Represents the results of a submission attempt triggered by explicit user action (as opposed to auto-send).
    MediaLoadingTask  
    SaveFormIndexTask

    Background task for loading a form.
